Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Laramie/Gladys
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Jackson, Central, Harrison, and Laramie due to, street blockage near Laramie/Gladys.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Laramie, Jackson, Central, Harrison, and Laramie, due to, street blockage near Laramie/Gladys.

Allow extra travel time.
